entry.title: Combined summary - Network status charts
entry.summary: There has been a formal announcement made regarding something that is not explicitly stated in the given context. The announcement can be found on the website Bitcointalk.org at the provided link. It appears to be a significant announcement as it has been repeated three times in the context. There is also mention of an HTML attachment being scrubbed, but no further information is given. As an intelligent assistant, I am unable to provide any additional details without more information.
